title: Dynasty: The Rise and Fall of the House of Caesar
description:
Dynasty: The Rise and Fall of the House of Caesar - Tom Holland [epub]

Author and historian Tom Holland returns to his roots in Roman history and the audience he cultivated with Rubiconâ€”his masterful, witty, brilliantly researched popular history of the fall of the Roman republicâ€”with Dynasty, a luridly fascinating history of the reign of the first five Roman emperors.
 
Dynasty continues Rubicon's story, opening where that book ended: with the murder of Julius Caesar. This is the period of the first and perhaps greatest Roman Emperors and it's a colorful story of rule and ruination, running from the rise of Augustus through to the death of Nero. Holland's expansive history also has distinct shades of I Claudius, with five wonderfully vivid (and in three cases, thoroughly depraved) Emperorsâ€”Augustus, Tiberius, Caligula, Claudius, and Neroâ€”featured, along with numerous fascinating secondary characters. Intrigue, murder, naked ambition and treachery, greed, gluttony, lust, incest, pageantry, decadenceâ€”the tale of these five Caesars continues to cast a mesmerizing spell across the millennia
